text: The VinFast VF 6 is a electric subcompact Crossover SUV made by VinFast since 2024. == History and Features == The VinFast VF 6 was first shown at the Electronics Consumer Show in 2022. at the same year it was shown at the Paris Motor Show in 2022. the SUV has advanced technology and is known for being one of the most advanced electric subcompact Crossover SUVs it has two versions:the Eco version has a electric motor with 130 kW (170 hp) and a range of 399 km (248 mi) while the Plus version has a electric motor with 150 kW (200 hp) and a range of 381 km (237 mi). == Markets == The VinFast VF 6 was first launched in Vietnam later it was launched in Europe in November 2024.https://vietnamnews.vn/economy/1688235/vinfast-officially-begins- vf-6-sales-in- europe.html#:~:text=December%2003%2C%202024%20%2D%2011:,boasts%20a%20distinctive%20design%20language. and India in 2025.https://vinfastauto.com/vn_en/vinfast-officially-enters-the- indian-market-with-the-launch-of-the-vf-6-and-vf-7 also in 2025 the SUV is expected to be launched in The United States. == References == Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles
title: VinFast VF 6
